description: Positions of the digit '0' in the decimal expansion of Pi.
links: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..183
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pi Digits.
mathematica: Flatten @ Position[ RealDigits[Pi - 3, 10, 500][[1]], 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 07 2011 *)
